game.name: SpookY2K
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 텍스트 크기 조절, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 자막 옵션, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You wake up on a cold bathroom floor, only to discover that you somehow time travelled to a Halloween party in 1999! As you try to make sense of your situation and get closer to the other guests, will your clueless involvement let the party take a deadly turn?
game.shortDescriptionEn: You wake up on a cold bathroom floor, only to discover that you somehow time travelled to a Halloween party in 1999! As you try to make sense of your situation and get closer to the other guests, will your clueless involvement let the party take a deadly turn?
